alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 9:18PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Glades County through 945 PM EDT... At 917 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a waterspout over Lake Okeechobee near Buckhead Ridge, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Waterspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally hazardous waters. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Buckhead Ridge. WATERSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
